reviews.review: oyunun yazlımını yapandan tut komple hepsinin amına koyayım hileden geçilmeyen bir oyun
İyi güzel hoş oyun da hileciler yüzünden oyundan hiç zevk alınmıyor. 2 el arkadaşlarınızla eğlenip çıkmak için oynanır yoksa rank falan kasayım derseniz insanı fıtık edebilir.

I think they should definitely have selected another name for the game, for example Need for Speed Shift 3, now it's very misleading. Based on Project Cars 2, I expected that concept to be further developed in the weak areas of PC2, like handling/physics and steering wheel force feedback, and continuing on the strengths like tons of cars and tracks and nice immersion in VR

Without a doubt one of the BEST FPS games out there.. But every GREAT game also has it's flaws.
With Matchmaking being one of csgo's biggest main attraction, the system could use some work.
The same could be said for it's anti-cheat system, making upgrading your account to prime a necessity, especially in 2020.
